# Introduction
MPK is a file with simple structure. Its been used by Steins;Gate and Steins;Gate 0 as far as I know

# Structure
The header of the MPK is

Name | Size | Values(if any) |
--- | --- | --- 
**IDENT** | 4 bytes | "MPK"\0
Null Bytes | 2 bytes | \0\0
Two | 2 bytes | 0x2
